section.name: Introduction
section.p: StatCvs-XML features a highly customizable report generator that is configurable through an XML file. This document describes the structure of the XML file.
If you are not familiar with the StatCvs-XML jargon like domain, view and grouping, please read about the concepts first.

section.name: Structure
section.p: The XML file is divided in document sections that each describe a file that aggregates a set of reports.
